step_data.thought: I've filled in the Template Name and Template Subject fields. Now I need to fill in the Template Content field, which is also required. This field appears to be a rich text editor where I can enter the body of the email that will be sent to customers. I should create a professional and helpful customer service response template that can be used for general customer inquiries. Let me fill in the Template Content field with appropriate content for a customer service response.
step_data.action:
fill('857', '

Dear {{var customer.name}},

Thank you for contacting our customer service team. We appreciate the opportunity to assist you with your inquiry regarding {{var inquiry.topic}}.

{{var response.details}}

If you have any further questions or need additional assistance, please don't hesitate to reply to this email or contact us at {{var store.phone}}.

Thank you for choosing us.

Best regards,
{{var sender.name}}
Customer Service Team
{{var store.name}}

')
